fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Leave this question blank if election was nonpartisan, i.e., no parties (not even pro-government parties) were allowed.
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Which of the following best describes the nature of electoral support for major parties(those gaining over 10 % of the vote)?

fxInfo_responses.value: Most major parties are competitive in only one or two regions of the country, i.e., their support is heavily concentrated in a few areas.
Most major parties are competitive in some regions of the country, but not in others.
Most major parties are competitive in most regions of the country.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2pscomprg, *_osp, *_ord
